name: Robot War Mayhem
description:
Ultimate Hero Evolution is the epic demonstration of fighting combat between the martial arts artists of futuristic robots in arena of revolution. You would have played many one on one fighting games but you never came across the futuristic one on one robot fight. It is an electrifying summation of robot fighting games and ring fighting wrestling games. So get ready for this ultimate robot battle in the futuristic battle ring. Play with your favorite robot hero among many top hero robots and challenge the opponents. This is a new generous of robot battle games with the patch up of robot fighting games with ring fighting games and robot boxing games with new Combat Style.
Play in story mode, defeating all the robot opponents moving up the ladder until you are the last man standing in arena, watch players fight one another in AI mode learning advanced moves and perfect combinations. Wrestling in multiple 3D realistic environments, Control, Punch, Jab Punch, Super Punch, Superkick​, Flip Kick and fight with all opponent robots carefully and defeat them badly in this ultimate hero evolution war game.
This is the complete action pack of modern Robots Ultimate wrestling simulator for your IOS devices. Download now for non-stop fun and enjoy war mayhem wrestling game of 2018.

Key Features:
- Unique combos and fighting styles.
- Different 3D stages with stunning views.
- Power ups to perform deadly combination.
- Training mode, story mode and fighting against the computer
With custom difficulty controls.
- Special attacks with joystick controls.
- Watch computer versus computer fights to master ultimate
Skills.
- Play anytime, anywhere with all new 3D robotic characters,
Wrestling in arena.
- Intuitive touch controls, and action-packed game-play.
